body_html:
Thanks for your comment.

I initially thought it would be possible for me to read the models from a region in memory reserved in the binary itself for storing models. I could then use flatbuffers to load the model from a pointer instead of a file path.

Unfortunately, XLA backends are not available for the platforms I'm targetting.
body_text:
Thanks for your comment.

Unfortunately, XLA backends are not available for the platforms I'm targetting.
body:
Thanks for your comment.

I initially thought it would be possible for me to read the models from a region in memory reserved in the binary itself for storing models. I could then use flatbuffers to load the model from a pointer instead of a file path. 

Unfortunately, XLA backends are not available for the platforms I'm targetting.
